history.proof: induction l1 as [| h1 t1 IH]. - simpl. rewrite neutral_l. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IH. auto.

ctx: induction l1 as [| h1 t1 IH].
exceptions.exn: The LHS of assoc (op _ (op _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: induction l1 as [| h1 t1 IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z h1 : I t1, l2 : seq I f : I -> T IH : iter (t1 ++ l2) f = op (iter t1 f) (iter l2 f) Unable to unify "op (op (f h1) (iter t1 f)) (iter l2 f)" with "op (f h1) (op (iter t1 f) (iter l2 f))".

original: induction l1 as [| h1 t1 IH]. - simpl. rewrite neutral_l. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite assoc. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
